definition: to teach/to be a teacher/to train/to coach

sentences.english: Perhaps you've always had a desire to coach Little League.
sentences.chinese: 也许你一直就渴望执教于少棒队。

sentences.english: You wanna talk about being outcoached, just watch this game.
sentences.chinese: 你想谈论没有执教能力，就看看这场比赛吧。

sentences.english: Dr. Huang is a professor of English literature at the Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 黄博士是英国文学教授，执教于北京大学。

sentences.english: Stefano Pioli is the new coach now, having been in charge of Modena.
sentences.chinese: 皮奥利是他们的新任主教练，执教过摩德纳。

sentences.english: I thought I would start out at youth level, which I did.
sentences.chinese: 我想我将会在青少年队开始执教，我也是这样开始的。

sentences.english: Yes, and she teaches in Peking University after graduation there.
sentences.chinese: 是的，她从北大毕业以后还在母校执教。

sentences.english: This was the largest margin of defeat for China after Gao Hongbo took the helm.
sentences.chinese: 这是高洪波执教中国队后的最大输球纪录。

sentences.english: From the team of Arrigo Sacchi, many former players are now coaching successfully.
sentences.chinese: 现在我正在通过执教青年队积累经验。

sentences.english: His father coached him his sophomore year of high school.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲执教了他的二年级年高中。

sentences.english: Under Mourinho's stewardship, Chelsea once became a sworn enemy of European governing body UEFA.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西在穆里尼奥执教期间曾与欧足联不共戴天。

sentences.english: He would also prefer national teams to be coached by a countryman.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，他也希望国家队能由本国教练执教。

sentences.english: The coaching is going well and I sometimes join in with mini games in training.
sentences.chinese: 执教还算顺利，训练时有时候会加入训练赛。

sentences.english: However now they are teaching in a state of the art campus, known around the world.
sentences.chinese: 然而现在他们在一个艺术院校执教，在世界都很有名。

sentences.english: He's now teaching in Zhu Hai Campus, Beijing Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 现执教于北京师范大学珠海分校。

sentences.english: Arenas had coached Onalfo at the University of Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 阿里纳斯曾执教于弗吉尼亚大学Onalfo。

sentences.english: Those who wish to teach students self-study textbooks to learn more about the knowledge back.
sentences.chinese: 执教者希望学员们自学课本，了解有关背知识。

definition: sporting coach/military drill master (in Song times)
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
foreign teacher (abbr. for 外國教師|外国教师)/greenhorn/novice/amateurish/religion other than Buddhism (term used by Buddhists)
to finish class/to get out of class
